name: UNICORN

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If the unicorn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The unicorn has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The unicorn makes one Hooves attack and one Radiant Horn attack.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Radiant Horn
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text: The unicorn casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14): At Will: Detect Evil and Good, Druidcraft. 1/Day Each: Calm Emotions, Dispel Evil and Good, Entangle, Pass without Trace, Word of Recall.

bonus_actions.name: Unicorn's Blessing (3/Day)
bonus_actions.text: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn and casts Cure Wounds or Lesser Restoration on that creature, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Charging Horn
legendary_actions.text: The unicorn moves up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks, and it makes one Radiant Horn attack.

legendary_actions.name: Shimmering Shield
legendary_actions.text: The unicorn targets itself or one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target gains 10 (3d6) Temporary Hit Points, and its AC increases by 2 until the end of the unicorn's next turn. The unicorn can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.
